name: Dwight BAKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Baker v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Dwight BAKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of FEBRUARY, 1986, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, the orders of the Board of Probation and Parole and the Commonwealth Court are vacated and the case is remanded to the Board for proceedings consistent with this Court’s opinion in Rivenbark v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, 509 Pa. 248, 501 A.2d 1110 (1985).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
506 A.2d 861
Dwight BAKER, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 21, 1986.
